about_the_game:
Jane is coming back again! Having restored the chain of her family hotels, she decided to try her hand at real estate business. Now you have a great chance to build your own city together with our successful business lady! Get ready, you will have very much to do: construct houses and electric power stations, build up the city infrastructure, hire the best workers, use the latest technical equipment and make all citizens happy! If you work good enough, all your dreams will come true in this challenging time management game from Realore! Help Jane to build the best city in the neighborhood and enjoy hours of addictive gameplay!

•Lots of challenging levels
•Combination of time management and sim-style features
•Changing weather conditions
•Variety of buildings and houses
•Acquire new skills in real estate business

Grab it while you can, and TELL YOUR FRIENDS!

Follow us on:
http://twitter.com/realoregames
http://www.facebook.com/RealoreGame

Jane is coming back again! Having restored the chain of her family hotels, she decided to try her hand at real estate business. Now you have a great chance to build your own city together with our successful business lady! Get ready, you will have very much to do: construct houses and electric power stations, build up the city infrastructure, hire the best workers, use the latest technical equipment and make all citizens happy! name: Jane's Realty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium III 800MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

short_description: Help Jane to build the best city in the neighborhood and enjoy hours of addictive gameplay!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
